code.Reset template confirm: Are you sure to restore the code template? All input and output to template values will be reset, please be careful to save the current code.

delete_api:
Are you sure you want to delete this API key? 
After deletion, the key will become invalid immediately and the corresponding conversation log will not be deleted. Please confirm!
field_description_placeholder: Describes the functionality of this input field, which affects the quality of model generation if the parameter is called for a tool
only_the_reference_type_is_supported: Only the Reference type is supported
optional_value_type_tip: One or more data types can be specified, and users can only select the configured type when adding fields in winter

template.ai_chat_intro: Call the AI model for a conversation
template.dataset_search_intro: Call the "Semantic Search" and "Full-text Search" capabilities to find reference content that may be related to the problem from the "Knowledge Base"
template.tool_call_intro: One or more function blocks are automatically selected for calling through the AI ​​model, and plug-ins can also be called.

variable_picker_tips: enter node name or variable name to search
